content.rendered:
Dear Grade 6 and New Grade 7/8 Maple Avenue Families,

DISCOVER MAPLE EVENT
August 27th, 2024
Discover Maple is a chance to spend time at Maple Avenue Middle School and learn what to expect during the 2024-2025 school year. You’ll have a chance to navigate through the building, find your locker, and walk through your schedule. In addition to traditional walk-through activities, you’ll also have a chance to work through the Back-to-School butterflies by participating in fun and informative activities.

Members of our peer mentoring team will be offering tours every half hour. Trust us, they have all the insider tips!

You’ll also have plenty of time to move at your own pace to visit several information booths and participate in fun activities led by some of Maple Avenue’s wonderful faculty and staff. There will be family activities, and parents and siblings are welcome to attend.

To attend the Discover Maple event, you will need to sign-up you and your child for either one of the sessions listed below.

C H O O S E O N E :

  • Session 1: Tuesday, 8/27 – 9 – 12 pm
    • Complimentary lunch will be provided from 11am to 12pm
  • Session 2: Tuesday, 8/27 – 12- 3 pm
    • Complimentary lunch will be provided 12pm to 1pm
Attached you’ll find additional Discover Maple information & the event registration QR Code. Or access the link below.
  • https://forms.office.com/r/r7L2p3khMx
If you have any questions, feel free to contact the Discover Maple Coordinators, Allison Hubbs (a_hubbs@saratogaschools.org) and Eileen Ellis (e_ellis@saratogaschools.org). They’ll be sure to answer all of your questions!

We’re looking forward to welcoming our 6th graders and new grade 7/8 students to Maple Avenue. Enjoy the rest of your summer!

Thanks for your continued support,

Discover Maple Planning Committee
